name: Cosmos explorer
description:
This is a recreation of the world generation system that was bodged together as one of my older projects. The original project broke on builds, was buggy and had issues with breaking the user's browser.  This version was rewritten in Godot for hopefully better stability and usability along with faster development times. 

Unfortunately, I couldn't export a web version, for some reason. However, please enjoy the builds provided below. Also, this will slow down your computer considerably at higher world scales, so be patient and don't turn the slider up to max.

Controls
If you are using keyboard, you can move around with the wasd keys and zoom in with q and out with e. You can also use a controller, with the left stick being for movement and the right stick being for zoom.

Credits

I am using the gravity font pack. All of the art was created by me previously and is available under the CC-BY-SA-4.0 license.
